page.title: 06INTERVIWS (Attitudes)
page.content: {Birchwood { Subject:Female (45 years),}resident for 23 years in a private house.There is a good bus service.There are many clubs and activities. The new area of flats look very bad being of a dull, unattractive design and full of litter.Children played on a large area of rough land often on bikes.The older council houses are more attractive. { Subject:Warden of old peoples' {residence.}There are many activities organised.It is a pleasant place for the elderly to live.The bus service is very good.Those in the residences were fortunate to be there. { Subject:Male (10 years),}resident only 4 months.There are many good shops and several activities to join. He disliked "brick walls everywhere", the litter and the vandalism.
